alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:33PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Allamakee and southeastern Winneshiek Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 833 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Decorah, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Allamakee and southeastern Winneshiek Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
